title: Google pixel 3a lost photos / corrupted
content:
Google pixel 3a I use for work. 

Lost about a hundred photos,  there is a time gap in my photographs taken. 

The photos directly before these have large areas of grey about 1/4 - 3/4s covering the image, as if they were corrupted.  Attached is example of what I mean. Occurred more than once. They aren't visible on the desktop version, etc etc. 


I spoke to Google support and screen shared who told me to post here. Cleared cache etc, restarted. Troubleshot with them but they said they can't help and I should post here. 

Is there any hope of retrieving these photos? 

Thanks.
